artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Ebisuya Shōshichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: Upper part (with groups of 3 little figures) illustrates all formations of the dance choreographed for a new year celebration song
marks: Dance instructions: (ヨイヨイヨイと手を打つ)　ほうらいの（トうへより角をして） 梓元の應需一陽齋戯画 {hanmoto no ōju Ichiyōsai giga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Actors Playing a Ken Game (with dance instructions)
